title: The Big Suey: Anti-Semantics
description:
Does Billy enjoy a random Amin trip to the studio or Greg Cote Tuesdays more? Amin tells us what's wrong with the Lakers and why a trade with the Pacers makes less sense than we think. Then, a thorough discussion on Kyrie Irving and antisemitism in the United States after Kyrie shared an antisemitic movie to his IG and Twitter and defended his actions in a postgame press conference.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
